roleset.name: make greater or bigger
roleset.note: MAGNIFY-V NOTES: It's possible, but unlikely, that this will be another quantifiableincrease verb like 'rise', but be on the lookout for examples with EXTor start/end points. (from magnify.01-v)

example.name: passivized
example.text: A spokesman for the Stamford, Conn. based company said operations had a loss of $5.5 million for the quarter; in addition, [the loss]-1 was magnified *trace*-1 by nonrecurring charges totaling $23.5 million and $8.2 million in asset-valuation adjustments that he described as ``unusual.''
example.arg: by nonrecurring charges totaling $23.5 million and $8.2 million in asset-valuation adjustments that he described as ``unusual
